translation: Create a free, private chat room

Instantly create free, permanent chat rooms on the fly with Zippy Chat. In just seconds you can create your own private chat room to share with your friends, coworkers, or whoever. Your private chat room will stay on the server, even when it's not in use!

Zippy Chat quickly creates permanent chat rooms, allowing you to get down to chatting immediately. It's instant messaging made easy. Just create a chat room, send your chat room's unique url to your friends and begin chatting!

Zippy Chat's chat rooms are permanent and private, and stay on the server even when they're not in use. You can post your chat room's url on the internet, and the chat room will still be working a month later.
Zippy Chat is written in PHP 5, using MySQL for database storage. It runs on a virtual private server hosted by ServInt.
By using this website and Zippy Chat's services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as outlined in this policy, and to our general Terms of Use.

Zippy Chat collects information from the user as part of the operation of the chat rooms, primarily including usernames and chat messages. This information is considered public. Chat rooms are freely accessible to all the internet, and as such any messages sent through chat rooms are not private.

In addition to the information collected for the chat rooms' operations, Zippy Chat collects timestamps and ip addresses, primarily to provide a means by which to prevent abuse of the chat rooms. This information is considered private and will never be shared with third parties for commercial purposes.
Zippy Chat may serve advertisements to its users. These advertisers may place cookies on your computer in order to deliver customized advertising.
If we're contacted by police or other legal and governmental authorities, Zippy Chat may release private information such as ip addresses or chat logs to those authorities.
Zippy Chat does not knowingly collect information from children. Children are restricted from using Zippy Chat and from transmiting any personal information to Zippy Chat.
This privacy policy may change at any time.
By using this website ("Zippy Chat"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use.
Zippy Chat understands and respects your desire for privacy. By using Zippy Chat and its services, you agree to Zippy Chat's Privacy Policy.

All information and services offered by Zippy Chat are provided "as is," with no warranties whatsoever. Zippy Chat disclaims to the fullest extend permitted by law all express, implied and statutory warranties.

We may modify or terminate our services, whenever, for any reason, without any notice. We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use from time to time without notice. Please check these Terms of Use periodically for changes.
Zippy Chat provides a chat service allowing users to create chat rooms and send messages within chat rooms. You may not upload, send, transmit, or otherwise make available any content that:
advances or facilitates any illegal activities;
is commercial or intended to advertise or promote the selling of any goods or services;
is obscene, pornographic, excessively violent or sexually explicit;
is hateful, discriminatory, offensive, vulgar, harassing, abusive or threatening;
infringes any intellectual property rights of any party;
you're legally prohibited from making available;
contains any computer viruses or any other computer code, files or porgrams meant to destroy, interrupt or otherwise limit the performance of any computer software or hardware.

All messages and information sent are the sole responsibility of the person who sends or publishes them. You are responsibile for all content you submit, send, transmit and display through Zippy Chat.
Zippy Chat reserves the right to

Since Zippy Chat is not obligated to monitor its chat rooms, users enter chat rooms at their own risk. Zippy Chat may not be held responsible for any emotional or real conequnces of using a chat room.
Zippy Chat reserves the right to

Zippy Chat reserves the right to—although not the obligation to—monitor, screen and moderate the content transmitted or displayed through Zippy Chat and to remove any content in its sole discretion. Despite this, you remain solely responsible for the content you transmit or display through Zippy Chat.
If provided, guests will need to know this password to enter your chat room.
